name: Drawn To Shelter
description:
Drawn to Shelter is a puzzle platformer that tests the player’s skills in overcoming obstacles and figuring out puzzles in a number of levels. To help the human character overcome the obstacles that stand in the protagonist’s way, the player must draw lines to not only protect and help the human avoid traps and enemies, but also to help the human reach its destination.

Draw and Protect: Use your drawing abilities to draw lines that can act as platforms to help the human progress through each level. The player can draw lines to protect the player from enemy turrets that shoot projectiles which can destroy the human.

Innovative and challenging obstacles: Help the human overcome each level’s different obstacles and help the human overcome the elemental levels such as avoiding lava traps, quick sand traps and ice spiked traps that can prevent the human from reaching its objective.

Collect the coins: Help the human collect coins, use your drawing skills to create pathways for the human to retrieve all 3 coins in each level.
